snippet.title: MXGP 24: The Official Game | Pre-Order Trailer
snippet.description:
After a 3-year break, the official game of the MXGP is back. All the official bikes and 20 tracks of the 2024 calendar await to give you the full championship experience.

Pre-order MXGP 24: The Official Game, and get a pack of 63 stickers to customise both your rider and your bike.

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2603040
Xbox: https://www.microsoft.com/p/buy/9NC1LMZVJQ6X
PlayStation: https://store.playstation.com/product/EP6665-PPSA22981_00-MXGP100000000000

Fox Holeshot Edition: 
Xbox: https://www.microsoft.com/p/buy/9PKDVDJDP4NR
PlayStation: https://store.playstation.com/product/EP6665-PPSA22981_00-MXGP1DELUXE00001
-------------------------------
